input_text:
Job Title: Technical Product Owner

Location: Denver, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Product Management

Description:
Our client, a leading healthcare organization, is seeking a Technical Product Owner to join their team. In this role, you will be responsible for driving product strategy based on research, data, and industry trends. This is a contract-based position that can be located in Denver (preferred) or fully remote.

Responsibilities Of The Technical Product Owner

Evolve product strategy based on research, data, and industry trendsWork closely with developers and architects to ensure product successDrive Agile methodologies and ensure successful implementationCollaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality productsBuild expertise in unfamiliar domains and achieve stretch goals in an innovative environment

Required skills of the Technical Product Owner:

 Technical PO-will need to have some development experience as they have to work closely with developers and architectsExcellent problem-solving, organizational and analytical skills with the ability to evolve product strategy based on research, data and industry trendsEntrepreneurial drive and an ability to thrive in an organization that changes quicklyDemonstrated ability to easily build expertise in unfamiliar domains, and achieve stretch goals in an innovative environmentExperience working in an AgileExperience with one or more of the following technologies: Java, Spring, Microservices and Cloud based technologies.

Preferred skills of the Technical Product Owner:

Experience in building healthcare-related productsExperience working in a highly regulated industry and/or working with legal and compliance teamsExceptional presentation skills; we like to show off our work, tell stories, and articulate the problems we’ve solved or how we’ve improved the physician/patient experienceFamiliarity or experience with SAFeExperience in building a product from the ground up

What’s in it for you?

Competitive compensation packageFull Benefits; Medical, Vision, Dental, and more!Opportunity to get in with an industry leading organizationClose-knit and team-oriented culture

Why IDR?

20+ Years of Proven Industry Experience in 4 major marketsEmployee Stock Ownership ProgramDedicated Engagement Manager who is committed to you and your successMedical, Dental, Vision, and Life InsuranceClearlyRated’s Best of Staffing® Client and Talent Award winner 10 years in a row

Salary: 70-75/hr based on experience

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.summary: A Technical Product Owner is sought by a leading healthcare organization.

Work closely with developers and architects
